name: Delicious Glittering Gemstones
desc: Multicolored biscuits. The sour and sweet jam gives off the clear luster of crystalline form, adding a shine to the crunchy treats. Such radiance! Such tastiness! What could this be but equal even to the most precious jewels?

customize.name: Recipe: Glittering Gemstones
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Glittering Gemstones.

customize.name: Glittering Gemstones
customize.desc: Multicolored biscuits. First, use dough to create a gemstone fitting, before adding jam of different colors and flavors to the setting. The result resembles nothing so much as an exquisite gemstone pendant, but be careful not to mix them up with the real thing!

customize.name: Suspicious Glittering Gemstones
customize.desc: Multicolored biscuits. This is exhausting to chew, almost as if your teeth are grinding against real gemstones... Perhaps you might even cause mortal hurt to your foes with this, were you to throw them from a hidden location in battle and catch them unawares.

customize.name: Delicious Glittering Gemstones
customize.desc: Multicolored biscuits. The sour and sweet jam gives off the clear luster of crystalline form, adding a shine to the crunchy treats. Such radiance! Such tastiness! What could this be but equal even to the most precious jewels?

customize.name: Cacahuatl
customize.desc: A crop rich in flavor. The fleshy part itself features a unique bitterness and its seeds, after being fermented and baked, can be made into other delicacies.

customize.name: Spinel Fruit
customize.desc: The crystalline trees that grow widely in areas with Liquid Phlogiston produce these gem-shaped fruits after absorbing phlogiston.

customize.name: Grainfruit
customize.desc: This plant is named after the giant grains that grow along the cob.

customize.name: Mint
customize.desc: A refreshingly cool ingredient. The cool, fresh flavor can cut through the heat of many dishes.

value.text:
A little surprise from the Children of Echoes.
Regenerates 1 HP to the selected character every 8s for 48s and displays the logo of the Children of Echoes. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
